title: NO LP Gas distribution today (16)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas announced that it will NOT distribute gas on Thursday (16).
The spokesman for Litro gas said that the unloading of gas from a vessel that reached Sri Lanka recently was completed.
However, Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe recently said that hospitals, hotels, and crematoriums would be given priority in gas distribution.
News 1st Correspondents said that gas queues are to be seen across the country.
Sri Lanka: Multiple protests in Colombo & suburbs demanding fuel
